name: Imodium A-D Anti-Diarrheal Caplets
description: Controls symptoms of diarrhea, including Traveler's Diarrhea, by slowing down gut movement.
warnings: Do not use if you have bloody or black stool. Consult a doctor if symptoms last more than 2 days.

name: Tylenol Extra Strength Caplets
description: Provides temporary relief of minor aches and pains due to headache, muscle pain, and more.
warnings: Do not exceed 3,000 mg in 24 hours. Avoid with other acetaminophen products. Liver warning: Severe liver damage may occur.

name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen SPF 55
description: Lightweight sunscreen that provides broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays.
warnings: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Keep out of eyes.

name: Advil Liqui-Gels
description: Provides fast-acting relief of pain and reduces fever due to conditions such as headaches, backaches, and minor arthritis.
warnings: Stomach bleeding warning: This product contains an NSAID, which may cause severe stomach bleeding. Do not use with other NSAIDs.

name: Zyrtec Allergy Relief Tablets
description: Relieves allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, itchy/watery eyes, and itching of the throat or nose.
warnings: Do not use if you have ever had an allergic reaction to this product or any of its ingredients.
